channel.title: Smf theme Moparscape
channel.description:
Hey all , I made a 5 minutes lay - out for Moparscape.... [url=http://www.ircd.be/moparscape/index.php]http://www.ircd.be/moparscape/index.php[/url] If any admin is intrested , Pm me . ( i think no ) Reply if there must be a change. NOTE : this is a demo board!
Thanks

item.title: Smf theme Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I think the general consensus with this discussion is we don’t need a new theme. If you make one and want to suggest it, feel free to post again. Thanks.

Resolved.

item.title: Smf theme Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Just so people know, if a theme is added it is not compulsory for you to use it. You can change the forum theme for you in your profile. When a theme is added it won’t automatically appear for everybody, you must change to it via your profile.

Read full topic

item.title: Smf theme Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Classic_, post:15, topic:443762”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=546440.msg4006085#msg4006085 date=1338655398]
I think since Taharok was promoted, we might get some nice changes here including a theme! Someone suggest a VERY nice looking theme.
[/quote]
Why. DO YOU WANT THIS TO TURN OUT LIKE R-SERVER

Seriously though, if you really want a theme maybe they would add one but not as default for the site, thats a good idea I think. Although themes really have no good use other than eye candy so why do we need it?[/quote]
I do believe no one is asking ANYONE to use the theme that COULD be added, so what’s the problem? If the theme gets enough votes, it would be added, however, I’m sure the veterans of this site wouldn’t use it, and no one is ask them to, so what’s the problem again I say?

And I never said this had to be bullshit vBulletin Rune-Server.

Read full topic

item.title: Smf theme Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Classic_, post:15, topic:443762”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=546440.msg4006085#msg4006085 date=1338655398]
I think since Taharok was promoted, we might get some nice changes here including a theme! Someone suggest a VERY nice looking theme.
[/quote]
Why. DO YOU WANT THIS TO TURN OUT LIKE R-SERVER

Seriously though, if you really want a theme maybe they would add one but not as default for the site, thats a good idea I think. Although themes really have no good use other than eye candy so why do we need it?[/quote]

im srs m8 no jok we shud get vbuletin nd get 800x600 pix of hawt girls & batman in evry kids siggy.

Actually, I think it’s not really the theme but the lack of images on this forum. I like it plain, but perhaps a few pictures might do? I’ve been wondering about a small (no bigger than 100x100) profile picture for regular members. Was this ever a regular feature to the MITB forums?

Read full topic

item.title: Smf theme Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you really want to please the administrators and push to get a new layout added to this forum, then you’d aught to spend more than 5 minutes making it. Quality layouts can take hours to create, we don’t want to add a layout that looks like a child made it. (I’m not saying that your layout looks like that, I’m just using it as a point.)

You should also have more confidence in the designs that you make/find, if you don’t think an administrator will like it, then they probably won’t. Be proud and confident! Just my two cents…

Read full topic
